argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | esumeq12dvaf.1 | |- F/ k ph |
| 2 |  | esumeq12dvaf.2 | |- ( ph -> A = B ) |
| 3 |  | esumeq12dvaf.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C = D ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_alrimi | |- ( ph -> A. k A = B ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_ex | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A -> C = D ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_ralrimi | |- ( ph -> A. k e. A C = D ) |
| 7 |  | #P_mpteq12f | |- ( ( A. k A = B /\ A. k e. A C = D ) -> ( k e. A |-> C ) = ( k e. B |-> D ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> C ) = ( k e. B |-> D ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. A |-> C ) ) = ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. B |-> D ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_unieqd | |- ( ph -> U. ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. A |-> C ) ) = U. ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. B |-> D ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_df-esum | |- sum* k e. A C = U. ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. A |-> C ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-esum | |- sum* k e. B D = U. ( ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) tsums ( k e. B |-> D ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> sum* k e. A C = sum* k e. B D ) |
